reviewText:
NOTE ADDED 4-9-15: I'm updating my old review to add that I have watched this at least 4 more times since my original review. It's still just as crazy, bad, and enjoyable now as the first time. And Veronica still makes my nether regions go all googly moogly every second she's on the screen. WATCH THIS MOVIE!!!! is all I'm saying folks, and have fun.
*****************BEGIN ORIGINAL REVIEW**********************

I'd like to say up front with complete honesty that the 5 stars are for Veronica Ricci. I love that woman and recommend all of her videos. Especially of the porn variety, she really loves the other ladies and looks great doings so is all I'm saying.

BUT I digress. Oh yeah, I also loved this movie! YES - it's bad. YES - the plot was clearly whipped up over a case of very cheap beer. They may have also been smoking cow chips but I don't mind that, my other reviews all mention my love of bad cinema so there you go. The badder the better and the more I love them, so under those guidelines this one is a real champ.

Oh, and absolutely YES - there definitely are many other gals besides the goddess Veronica, some also amazing looking, but a few are iffy. Still every opinion differs right? BUT - this takes place mostly in a strip club, the shoddiest one you'll ever want to visit. And it's also the most confusing one. A few girls get naked, most don't, some dance, some do something else but I'm not sure what. It's so strange how this place is run but that harkens back to the writing, cheap beer, and cow chips see, so it's OK, I understand.

And finally YES YES YES - there are beautiful women in this movie fondling and kissing and slurping on each other. YES!
I'd give it a 6th star for that but 5 will have to do. So grab some beer, get comfy, and enjoy! I sure did.

PS: yes there's a snake and various snake-related happenings surrounding Veronica. Watch it to see the fantasy/spiritual side of things. They're kind of cool but i watched it for the babes. I'm a simple guy with simple needs.

Everything that I wrote about Bloody Mary,the other Veronica Ricci movie ,applies to this one. Do not expect a great plot, greatly acted movie but it is fun if you enjoy bad movies like I do. Veronica Ricci is one beautiful woman and any fan of her will not be dissapointed watching this film.
